ritwals 0.0.0.9101
  • Reference

WALS Language Metadata

WALS_languages.Rd

Information about the languages in WALS.

Format

A data frame of 2679 rows (one row per language) with the following 12 variables:

language_ID

Language's WALS ID (or 'WALS code')

iso_code

Language's ISO code

glottocode

Language's Glottolog code

language

Language's name

family

Language's family

genus

Language's genus

macroarea

Language's macroarea

countrycodes

Country codes associated with language

latitude

Language's latitude in degrees

longitude

Language's longitude in degrees

in_WALS_100

Boolean: TRUE if language belongs to the WALS 100-language sample

in_WALS_200

Boolean: TRUE if language belongs to the WALS 200-language sample

Source

http://wals.info

Examples

# The number of WALS genera:
length(unique(WALS_languages$genus))
#> [1] 544

# Frequency table of languages per family:
table(WALS_languages$family)
